```blade
{{-- components/vendor/auth/registration-step.blade.php --}}
@props([
    'number' => 1,
    'label' => 'Step',
    'active' => false,
    'completed' => false
])

@php
    $baseClasses = "flex flex-col items-center flex-1 transition-all duration-300";
    $activeClasses = "text-blue-600 font-semibold";
    $completedClasses = "text-green-600 font-semibold";
    $inactiveClasses = "text-gray-400";
    
    $textClass = $active ? $activeClasses : ($completed ? $completedClasses : $inactiveClasses);
@endphp

<div {{ $attributes->merge(['class' => $baseClasses]) }}>
    <div class="flex items-center justify-center w-8 h-8 rounded-full mb-2 
                {{ $active ? 'bg-blue-600 text-white' : 
                   ($completed ? 'bg-green-500 text-white' : 'bg-gray-200 text-gray-500') }}">
        @if($completed)
            <svg class="w-4 h-4" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20">
                <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M16.707 5.293a1 1 0 010 1.414l-8 8a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-4-4a1 1 0 011.414-1.414L8 12.586l7.293-7.293a1 1 0 011.414 0z" clip-rule="evenodd" />
            </svg>
        @else
            {{ $number }}
        @endif
    </div>
    <span class="text-xs {{ $textClass }} text-center">{{ $label }}</span>
    
    <!-- Connector Line -->
    @if($number < 4)
        <div class="absolute top-4 left-1/2 w-full h-0.5 -z-10 
                    {{ $completed ? 'bg-green-500' : 'bg-gray-200' }}"></div>
    @endif
</div>
```

üîß Livewire Component Integration

```php
<?php
// app/Livewire/VendorRegistration.php

namespace App\Livewire;

use Livewire\Component;
use Livewire\WithFileUploads;
use App\Services\VendorRegistrationService;

class VendorRegistration extends Component
{
    use WithFileUploads;

    public $currentStep = 1;
    public $formData = [];
    
    // Step validation rules
    protected $rules = [
        // Step 1
        'formData.first_name' => 'required|string|max:100',
        'formData.last_name' => 'required|string|max:100',
        'formData.email' => 'required|email|unique:users,email',
        'formData.phone' => 'required|string|max:20',
        'formData.password' => 'required|min:8|confirmed',
        'formData.agree_terms' => 'accepted',
        
        // Step 2
        'formData.shop_name' => 'required|string|max:255|unique:vendors,shop_name',
        'formData.shop_description' => 'required|string|min:50',
        'formData.shop_category' => 'required|exists:categories,id',
        'formData.shop_logo' => 'nullable|image|max:2048',
        'formData.shop_banner' => 'nullable|image|max:5120',
        
        // Step 3
        'formData.bank_name' => 'required|string',
        'formData.bank_account_number' => 'required|string',
        'formData.bank_account_name' => 'required|string',
        'formData.business_province' => 'required',
        'formData.business_district' => 'required',
        'formData.business_subdistrict' => 'required',
        'formData.business_address_line1' => 'required',
        
        // Step 4
        'formData.final_agreement' => 'accepted',
    ];

    public function saveStep1()
    {
        $this->validateOnly([
            'formData.first_name',
            'formData.last_name', 
            'formData.email',
            'formData.phone',
            'formData.password',
            'formData.agree_terms'
        ]);

        $this->currentStep = 2;
    }

    public function saveStep2()
    {
        $this->validateOnly([
            'formData.shop_name',
            'formData.shop_description',
            'formData.shop_category',
            'formData.shop_logo',
            'formData.shop_banner'
        ]);

        $this->currentStep = 3;
    }

    public function saveStep3()
    {
        $this->validateOnly([
            'formData.bank_name',
            'formData.bank_account_number',
            'formData.bank_account_name',
            'formData.business_province',
            'formData.business_district', 
            'formData.business_subdistrict',
            'formData.business_address_line1'
        ]);

        $this->currentStep = 4;
    }

    public function submitRegistration()
    {
        $this->validate();

        try {
            $service = app(VendorRegistrationService::class);
            $vendor = $service->register($this->formData);
            
            // Redirect to success page
            return redirect()->route('vendor.registration.success');
            
        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            $this->addError('registration', '‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡∏°‡∏±‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏™‡∏≥‡πÄ‡∏£‡πá‡∏à: ' . $e->getMessage());
        }
    }

    public function previousStep()
    {
        if ($this->currentStep > 1) {
            $this->currentStep--;
        }
    }

    public function render()
    {
        return view('livewire.vendor-registration')
            ->layout('components.layouts.auth');
    }
}
```
